analysis.description:
Reentrancy in NescrowExchangeService.depositToken (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#73-80):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(Token(token).transferFrom(msg.sender,this,toTokenAmount(token,amount))) (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#74-76)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#76)

Reentrancy in NescrowExchangeService.sendTipsToken (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#86-91):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(Token(token).transferFrom(msg.sender,this,toTokenAmount(token,amount))) (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#88-91)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#91)

NescrowExchangeService.setDisableFees (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#207-212) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(timestamp > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#208-209)

NescrowExchangeService.invalidateOrder (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#212-216) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(timestamp > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#213-214)

NescrowExchangeService.isUserMakerFeeEnabled (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#234-240) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- makerFeeRate > 0 && disableFees[user] < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#238-240)

NescrowExchangeService.isUserTakerFeeEnabled (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#241-245) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- takerFeeRate > 0 && disableFees[user] < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#245)

NescrowExchangeService.trade (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#245-292) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp <= amounts[3]) (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#252)

NescrowExchangeService.tradeWithTips (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#292-371) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

NescrowExchangeService.feeRateMin should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#22)

Token.standard should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#4-5)
Token.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xedd7868662f1ae17c53ddaea63469b4c1292ea7c.sol#6-7)
